page.title: 13Weeton village: some events
page.content:
{Weeton Village Hall Newsletter, {September-November, 1985.}
{Thanks} The Garden Party held in July was a great success and the Jumble Sale in September raised over Â£325. {Meetings} Whist and Dominoes on the first Wednesday of every month. Ballet and Tap for children each Wednesday. Mothers' Union, Women's Institute, Girls' Friendly Society. {Village School }The AGM of the Parent-Teachers-Friends Association was well attended. A visit to Tatton Hall and a Halloween Party have been arranged. {Requests}for waste paper in aid of the local scout group, good homes for kittens and puppies, not to allow dogs to foul the footpath leading to the school, volunteers to help the R.S.P.C.A. by collecting stray cats.
